text: Jeri Lynn Mooney (born January 28, 1944), also known as Susan Howard, is an American actress and writer. She works in both movies and television series. She played Maggie in Petrocelli. She played Donna in Dallas from 1979 to 1987. In The Love Boat, she played Cynthia. Mooney was born in Marshall, Texas. ==Other websites== * Category:Actors from Texas Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Writers from Texas Category:1944 births Category:Living people
title: Susan Howard
